comments:

   <extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.workbench.texteditor.hyperlinkDetectors">
      <hyperlinkDetector            
            class="org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.tasks.ui.editors.TaskHyperlinkDetector"
            id="org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui.hyperlinks.detectors.task"
            name="Mylyn Tasks"
            targetId="org.eclipse.ui.DefaultTextEditor">
      </hyperlinkDetector>

Hi Eugene,

I was unable to reproduce the AIOOBE.
The current code in question seems to be sufficiently guarded against AIOOBEs.
What is the build ID of the Eclipse SDK you are using?

Also, the array contents in question are generated by a call to a JDT utility method.  What version of JDK are you using?
It is Version: 3.3.0 Build id: I20070608-1718

Fixed. Added array guard. Patch released to HEAD.

Target:  3.4 M1
